subject: Tennis
organizations: University of California at Santa Barbara
lead_paragraph: Jimmy Connors was arrested outside the campus arena where the University of California at Santa Barbara hosted top-ranked North Carolina in a men’s basketball game Friday night. Connors, an eight-time Grand Slam champion, was taken into custody after refusing to comply with an order to leave an area near the entrance to the arena after a confrontation, the police said in a statement.
